title: Self Avoiding Walk
description: It's finally time to attempt a Self-Avoiding Walk! In this video, I quickly visualize a simple JavaScript p5.js implementation of a self-avoiding walk. I then tackle the more complex problem of backtracking to find a solution to a space-filling self-avoiding walk.

timestamps.title: Explain! How can we go about this?
Code! Let's add a visited grid.
Code! What are the options for movement now?
I could stop here but wait.
Explain! How can we think about backtracking?
Code! Let's make a spot class and a path variable.
Whoops! Copying allOptions was a mistake.
Code! Maybe we need an end condition.
This could take awhile. Could it be improved?
